rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with a large dining space integrated into the same zone. Features low-profile seating and accessible flooring for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with built-in shelves and accessible desk space. Located near the entrance for easy access.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen combined with dining area. Equipped with accessible design, lower countertops and non-slip flooring.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom space designed for occasional use with built-in storage. Wheelchair accessible, simple design.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Features wide corridors and step-free access.

rooms.name: Bathroom (En-suite)
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible en-suite bathroom with grab bars and non-slip surfaces.

rooms.name: Storage & Utility Room
rooms.description: Compact area for storage and essential utilities. Designed to be easily accessible from the kitchen.
